2_1Hv2SAkcMHkNRHTsdLZ6jg8neGtCZrTEr2.body: I don't know if is good or bad, what I know is hebephilia is good, or at least neutral, society needs to stop pretending is not a thing, everyone of us was horny when 12 yo, I fucked my teacher at that age and was glorious, luckyly (that's a word?) noone knew, if someone knew it would be jail for her. Laws adjust to the reality, not the other way around, at least I live on a kind of civilizad country.
